Description: Marl pottery bowl with unpolished red slip on the interior and also on exterior lip.
Curator's comments: Like Late ware L16b in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery. Grave 36 in the Fort Cemetery was excavated by John Garstang and is published in B. Adams, The Fort Cemetery at Hierakonpolis (1987), p. 37.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Frederick George Hilton Price
